resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/40892253</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>40892253</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206306</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Solar System Simulator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solarsystem Simulator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Simulateur de Système Solaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Simulador Do Sistema Solar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Simulatore Del Sistema Solare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσομοιωτής ηλιακών συστημάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Simulador De la Sistema Solar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">invites you to create a color image of your favorite planet or satellite from different vantage points in the universe. This is one of NASA's most popular sites and receives 36,000 requests per day.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">lädt Sie ein, ein Farbe Bild Ihres 
Lieblingsplaneten oder Satelliten von den unterschiedlichen günstigen
Punkten im Universum zu erstellen. Dieses ist eine von die NASA 
populärsten Sites und empfängt 36.000 Anträge pro Tag.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vous invite à créer une image de couleur de 
votre planète ou satellite préférée de différentes positions 
avantageuses dans l'univers. C'est l'un des sites les plus 
populaires des NASA et reçoit 36.000 demandes par jour.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">convida-o criar uma imagem da cor de seu planeta 
ou satélite favorito dos pontos vantage diferentes no universo. 
Este é um dos locais os mais populares das NASA e recebe 36.000
pedidos por o dia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">li invita a creare un'immagine di colore del 
vostro pianeta o satellite favorito dalle posizioni di vantaggio 
differenti nell'universo. Ciò è uno dei luoghi più popolari 
delle NASA e riceve 36.000 richieste al giorno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σας προσκαλεί για να δημιουργήσει μια εικόνα χρώματος 
του αγαπημένου πλανήτη ή του δορυφόρου σας από τα διαφορετικά 
πλεονέκτά σημεία στον κόσμο. Αυτό είναι μια από τις 
δημοφιλέστερες περιοχές της NASA και λαμβάνει 36.000 
αιτήματα ανά ημέρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">le invita a que cree una imagen del color de su 
planeta o satélite preferido de diversas posiciones ventajosas en el 
universo. Éste es uno de los sitios más populares de las NASA 
y recibe 36.000 peticiones por día.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206306</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>40892253</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/solar-system-simulator</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
